We offer Home Delivery (shipped to your address) and Store Pickup (order online, collect at a store). You choose at checkout. Store pickup is usually ready within 24-48 hours.

q: What is Aura Wallet and AuraPoints?
a: Aura Wallet holds your balance and AuraPoints (rewards). You earn 5% on orders under Rs 1000 and 7% on orders Rs 1000 and above. Points are credited after delivery, valid 30 days. You can use them for purchases or add money via Razorpay.

q: How do I track my order?
a: Go to Profile then My Orders and click your order. You will see status: pending, confirmed, ready for pickup, delivered. For store pickup you get a QR code to show at the store.

q: How do I return or get a refund?
a: Contact support from the order page. Once approved, ship the item back. Refunds are credited within 5-7 business days.

q: How do I get product recommendations?
a: Use the AI chat: recommend phones under 30000, best casual shirts, or trending products. Our AI uses your browsing and preferences. You can also browse by category and use filters.

q: Can the AI order something for me?
a: Yes. In chat say order this for me or buy the items in my cart. The assistant will guide you to checkout and help complete the order. You confirm before payment.

q: What if a product is out of stock?
a: Out-of-stock items are marked on the product page. Ask the AI for similar alternatives or add to wishlist to get notified when back.
